Friday Selfie
Happy Friday, #MastoMates! Wolverine was always one of my favorite X-Men. As a kid I thought Weapon-X was one of the best comics ever made. But maybe it was just Barry Windsor-Smith's art.#Selfie #SelfieTherapy #GeekFashion #GraphicTee #Wolverine #XMen #Comics

content.html:
Friday Selfie

Happy Friday, #MastoMates!

Wolverine was always one of my favorite X-Men. As a kid I thought Weapon-X was one of the best comics ever made. But maybe it was just Barry Windsor-Smith's art.

#Selfie #SelfieTherapy #GeekFashion #GraphicTee #Wolverine #XMen #Comics
